feature_model.name: Card Payment Terminal

meta.data: Describes card payment terminal with direct debit and credit card possibilities

feature_model.feature_tree: :r CPTerminal(CPTerminal) :m PaymentSchema(PaymentSchema) :g (_r_1_5) [1,*] : DirectDebit(DirectDebit) :g (_r_1_5_6_8) [1,*] : DebitCard(DebitCard) : EPurse(EPurse) : PrepaidCard(PrepaidCard) : CreditCard(CreditCard) :m Connectivity(Connectivity) :g (_r_2_12) [1,*] : Online(Online) :g (_r_2_12_13_15) [1,*] : PSTN(PSTN) : Mobile3G(Mobile3G) : VPN(VPN) : PrivateWAN(PrivateWAN) : Offline(Offline) :m CardReader(CardReader) :g (_r_3_20) [1,*] : Chip(Chip) : MagStrip(MagStrip) : NFC(NFC) :o Identification(Identification) :o PIN(PIN) :m Signature(Signature)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:Identification or ~CreditCard constraint_4:~PrepaidCard or Chip or NFC constraint_2:~DebitCard or PIN constraint_3:~EPurse or Chip or NFC
